mean_en: tending to offend or upset people :not showing or having tact
word_etyma: tact机智，老练圆滑 + less无...的、不...的 →  不机智的；不老练的；笨拙的
short_phrase: say sth. tactless at the table
sentence: You told your mother-in-law what her daughter looks like naked? That was so tactless of you.
sentence_trans: 你对丈母娘说她女儿裸体时的样子？你也太笨了吧！
